headline: Rain showers rolling in for mid-week
author: Dontae Jones
sentences: Chance of a few showers Tuesday afternoon (30%) with wider coverage on showers Tuesday night with more widespread showers (thunder) on Wednesday.
CLEVELAND (WJW) – Overnight, clouds increase and temperatures are not as chilly, in the lower 40s.
It’s a mild start to the week with temperatures around 60 through Wednesday.
